attributes.action: Support Simon Corney (Oldham Athletic Owner) decision to sign Ched Evans
attributes.additional_details:
Let's support Simon Corney's decision to sign Ched Evans, he didn't evade justice, he was imprisoned and should be supported to live a crime-free life if, what benefit can be derived from Ched Evans not being able to play football again?

He is not a role model, just because he plays football doesn't automatically makes him a role model, parents should train and guide their children as to whose lifestyle they should emulate , not just anyone who appears on the television.

Parents should nurture their children and not leave it up to strangers to do that for them.
